approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The task creation process should include a text field for the task description.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all created tasks. Each task in the list should show its description.

requirements.title: Application Load Time
requirements.description: The application shall load quickly. The time taken for the initial page load should be less than 2 seconds.

requirements.title: User Authentication
requirements.description: The system shall implement user authentication to secure user data.

requirements.title: Data Encryption (Optional)
requirements.description: All sensitive data stored in the database should be encrypted.
